title: Roccat Vulcan II Max
description: Dual-LEDs and a gorgeously pared back design complete a pricey but premium slab.

title: I'm so used to old Steam, new Steam's menus kinda freak me out
description: After so many years, even small changes to Steam really throw me for a loop.

title: Brace yourself: Discord is going to make everyone pick a new username
description: Discord is eliminating the "discriminator" numbers from usernames, which is good news—but there's a downside.

title: Activision will let you pay to make your Call of Duty guns sound like 2009
description: Activision is making a habit of bottling up Call of Duty nostalgia and selling it back to players.

title: Valve won't let devs frontload Steam screenshot galleries with a dozen trailers anymore, says many don't know 'how best to manage' the space
description: The latest update puts a limit on videos that can be displayed at the front of the thumbnail row.

title: Nvidia is best known for building GPUs but says it actually spends '80% of our time on the software'
description: Nvidia reminds us that it has other things going on than just graphics cards.

title: PSA: The trailer for Dune: Part Two looks dope, whatever the rest of the PC Gamer team think
description: "Didn't all the interesting characters die?" is one of several takes I am choosing to ignore while clambering aboard the hype worm.

title: Former Dragon Age lead writer claims BioWare 'quietly resented' its writers
description: David Gaider says he felt the resentment "distinctly" prior to his departure from BioWare in 2016.

title: I am absolutely hypnotised by the balls of Blizzard's VFX artists
description: A spherically-themed showreel was created as part of an internal challenge.

title: A new lo-fi Sims competitor just launched in early access
description: Tiny Life isn't the biggest Sims competitor, but it's already trying to do somethings The Sims hasn't.

title: This new Counter-Strike map was created to smuggle the truth about the Ukraine war into Russia
description: The Finnish newspaper Helsinin Sanomat has created a CS:GO map with a secret press room detailing the war in Ukraine.

title: ChatGPT's Italy ban reversed after privacy concerns addressed, banned at Samsung due to privacy concerns
description: You guess it! Privacy sits as the chief concern in both cases.

title: Nvidia RTX 30-series GPUs have 30% market share to AMD RX 6000's 3% in revised Steam survey
description: Nvidia's RTX 30-series GPUs are easily the most popular with Steam gamers

title: Microsoft promises 'tons of gameplay' in June 11 Starfield deep-dive
description: The Xbox Games Showcase and Starfield Direct are set to begin at 10 am PT/1 pm ET.

title: System Shock studio angers fans by having an AI imagine its own evil AI
description: Shodan have done that.

title: This new co-op survival action RPG the developer calls 'Valheim meets Zelda' has my full attention
description: In Enshrouded you can explore, craft, battle monsters, and build a base or even an entire town with up to 16 players.

title: Ravenlok review
description: Ravenlok is a beautiful action-adventure interpretation of Alice In Wonderland, but its qualities only run skin deep.

title: How to unlock the Old Trunk in World of Warcraft
description: Finding the mouse is key.

title: Bungie lawsuit ends with Destiny cheat-seller on the hook for $12M
description: This guy got both barrels alright.

title: Dwarf Fortress update adds babies for everything, and stops dwarves dying from thirst because they couldn't pick up goblets
description: Even the dragons get hatchlings.

title: Nvidia's RTX 4090 dips below MSRP in Europe as GPU prices continue to fall
description: Still not cheap, but going in the right direction.

title: Dredge is finally getting a fiend-free fishing mode and map markers
description: Free DLC is adding two of my biggest wants for the fishing horror.

title: AMD will launch a new 'mainstream' GPU by the end of June and it's almost certainly the 7600 XT
description: But will it be priced low enough to actually be worth buying?

title: Pathfinder is getting its own Diablo-like action-RPG
description: Pathfinder: Abomination Vaults, based on the tabletop campaign, is coming soon to Kickstarter.

description: This treasure is tricky to get into if you don't know how.

title: Launch your new Steam obsession with Oddyssey: Your Space, Your Way
description: Developer Weird Fish welcomes user feedback for its new deep space exploration adventure, now on Steam early access.

title: Razer makes sunglasses now, and no, they don't have RGB lighting
description: They'd probably look better if they did.

description: Today's Wordle: Help with the #683 puzzle.

title: The whole Super Mario Bros. Movie was uploaded to Twitter
description: Please learn how to use torrents, I'm begging you.

title: Can survival games tell compelling stories, and why do they bother?
description: Getting a satisfying narrative out of a survival game can be as hard as punching wood out of trees.
